item.title: 1: Indian Economy on the eve of Independence
2. The Recovery of India
item.description: Important links Visible Hand: Public Policy and Economic Growth in the Nehru Era The Recovery of India Introduction Paper written by Pulapre Balakrishna (PB) in 2007 when Indian economy was growing at around 9% (constant prices). A certain despondency induced by a sense of an allegedly “wasted past”. Some have blamed Nehru and the policies adopted under his leadership. These are serious allegations that need to be addressed.
There are no announcements as of now.
